official-title.#text: To provide funds during the lapse of appropriations for the payment of military death gratuities and funeral and related transportation and housing expenses through the transfer of unobligated amounts in the Health Insurance Reform Implementation Fund.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall transfer, from unobligated amounts in the Health Insurance Reform Implementation Fund established by
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Secretary of Health and Human Services

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: to provide the following benefits on behalf of members of the Armed Forces who die during such period:

text.#text: During any period for which interim or full-year appropriations for fiscal year 2014 are not in effect for a purpose specified in this section, the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 1005 of the Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act of 2010
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act of 2010/s:1005

header.#text: Source of funds for payment of military death gratuities and funeral and related transportation and housing expenses

text.#text: The payment of a death gratuity under
The payment or reimbursement for funeral and burial expenses authorized under
The payment or reimbursement of authorized funeral travel and travel related to the dignified transfer of remains and unit memorial services under
The temporary continuation of a basic allowance of housing for dependents of members dying on active duty, as authorized by

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 3289 IH: To provide funds during the lapse of appropriations for the payment of military death gratuities and funeral and related transportation and housing expenses through the transfer of unobligated amounts in the Health Insurance Reform Implementation Fund.
